title: Ohhh Say Can You Sit?
itunes:title: Ohhh Say Can You Sit?
description:
MON 8/29 - The Breakfast Club discusses Kanye West's Teyana Taylor Takeover (triple T score) at the VMAs with the premiere of his video "Fade", Drake's love for Rihanna as he presented her award and 49ers QB Colin Kaepernick's decision to sit during the national anthem from here on out. Hee-haws go to anyone who bashes him for out. Find out why...

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
